entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 25 March 2023
